column4: Hi. Anyone there able to help a complete novice? I've just got my computer rebuilt and am trying to install Ubuntu. Something is wrong: either the Ubuntu CD I'm using, or the CD drive. Don't know which.
Started trying to install. Looked ok. Then hung on the time zone screen.
try another livecd if possible to rule out the CD Drive problem
I got 5 CDs shipped and managed to shift 3 of them to interested friends! Vive Ubuntu!
